clearModals._description: ONLY used by the new nav. use this to clear any modal routes

navUpToScreen._description: ONLY used by the new nav. Navigates up to this route if it already exists, noops otherwise.

switchLoggedIn._description: ONLY used by the new nav. Switch login stacks

switchTab._description: ONLY used by the new nav. Switch to a different tab.

resetStack._description: Reset a specific stack. actions is route tree actions TODO better typing
